Articles.Content:
This is a program that is attempting to build the next gen Interceptor fighter to be built for the Kerbal State Alliance (K.S.A). 

Requirements to build: 

  • High-speed excess of Mach 4 without burner

 

  • Reduced radar cross section

 

  • High maneuverability at low IAS  decreased drag at high mach

 

  • high internal Storage with up to 6 internal radar guided missiles (medium range) or 3 radar guided long range missiles or 1-3 cruise missiles as well as alternate JDAM or other storage can store 4 jdam's at minimum.  (recommend conformal)

 

  •  air to air and air to ground radar with IRST

Recommended building techniques:

  • procedural wings to lower part count

 

  • procedural fuel tanks to allow fuel storage

 

  • BD armory, BD armory +, and SMI missiles are allowed 

Optional 

  • Make it look cool 

Winner will have bd armory fight and and will do a cinematic video release 

 

Good luck and Fly somewhat safe

You can submit crafts here'

thank you
